channel.title: My first try on creating my own game
channel.description:
After all these years of programming rsps, I've never tried to actually create a little game myself. This will be my first try :p
Don't be jealous of my pixelizing skills :p hahaha
[img]http://pixldrop.com/view/dxkMW5iu.png[/img]

item.title: My first try on creating my own game
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

What exactly are you trying to show us? If you want help with the general game design aspect, we can move this to the game development forum. If you want help with programming or people to look at your code, it can stay here, but you need to show us something.

Read full topic
item.source: My first try on creating my own game

item.title: My first try on creating my own game
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:2, topic:542504"]If you showed us your code we could give you some advice.
You don’t have to but I think that this section is not for showing off , it’s for helping each other learn and sharing information.[/quote]
You are right. Without providing any information relating to the code of the application, there is nothing here related to programming, other than the fact that you are using a programming language.

Read full topic
item.source: My first try on creating my own game
